title: Trolls in Ranked OCE
body: Why do people troll in ranked? They cost other people IP an there isn't anything RIOT does about it, they don't reimburse IP or do anything to stop these people from doing it, its completely unfair on people who want to actually get better at the game an raise the ranks. Is there anything (Apart from not playing ranked) that can be done?

replies.body: First game of the season got a troll who fed hard , at the end of the game they said "more fun to troll then play". gg rito
